page.title: 09A Housewife's Life Burmarsh
page.content:
(Continued from Page 8)
Mrs X's recreations are gardening,(they have a flower garden, but no vegetables), watching television, fund-raising for the Cubs, helping at the village school (i.e. teaching children how to use the school computer), and knitting. The family pets are 2 cats, 2 hamsters, 2 rabbits, 1 guinea pig, 1 donkey and 2 sheep which are kept for grazing, and as pets. The house drains to a septic tank that needs attention once a year because of the extra grease from the Tea Room.
